original_text: The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel (he was the firstborn, but when he defiled his father’s marriage bed, his rights as firstborn were given to the sons of Joseph son of Israel; so he could not be listed in the genealogical record in accordance with his birthright,
korean_text: 이스라엘의 장자 르우벤의 아들들은 이러하니라 (르우벤은 장자라도 그의 아버지의 침상을 더럽혔으므로 장자의 명분이 이스라엘의 아들 요셉의 자손에게로 돌아가서 족보에 장자의 명분대로 기록되지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel
but when he defiled his father's marriage bed
his rights as firstborn were given to the sons of Joseph
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 장자의 권리가 요셉의 아들들에게 주어졌고

sentences.original_text: so he could not be listed in the genealogical record
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 족보에 기록될 수 없었으니
